entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches dissipating this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Wednesday 04 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening then partly cloudy. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Wednesday 04 January 2023
